features: 1-liter of Listerine Clinical Solutions Breath Defense Zero Alcohol Mouthwash in a Smooth Mint flavor, an alcohol-free oral rinse to fight odor for fresh breath all day
The alcohol-free fresh breath mouthwash is powered with odor-neutralizing technology that kills germs, purifies odor molecules and prevents bad breath
This mint oral rinse from Listerine fights odor for fresh breath and delivers triple-action bad breath defense for 24-hours* *when used twice daily
Adults and children 12 and older, use this clinical mouthwash twice daily by swishing with 20 mL for 30 seconds. Children ages 6 to 11, rinse twice daily with 10 mL for 30s. Do not swallow mouthwash

Tested by dentists and hygienists, this ADA-accepted smooth mint mouthwash aids in the prevention of bad breath for a refreshing mouth feel, making it a perfect addition to your twice daily oral care routine
body.description: Enjoy fresh breath all day long with Listerine Clinical Solutions Breath Defense Zero Alcohol Mouthwash in a Smooth Mint flavor. This alcohol-free mouthwash from Listerine, the #1 dentist recommended mouthwash, provides long-lasting odor-fighting breath protection. This ADA-accepted mouthwash has a triple-action formula powered by odor-neutralizing technology that kills germs, purifies odor molecules, & prevents bad breath for a full 24 hours when used as directed twice daily. Tested by dentists & hygienists, this mouthwash has a fresh & smooth mint flavor for a refreshing whole-mouth feel. The mouthwash contains zero alcohol, and is a great choice for adding to your twice daily oral care routine. For best results, adults & children 12 & older should use this mouthwash twice daily by swishing with 20 mL for 30 seconds. Children ages 6 to 11 should rinse twice daily for 30 seconds with 10 mL of this breath freshening mouthwash. Spit out after swishing. Do not swallow mouthwash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing and Effective Alcohol-Free Mouthwash!
reviews.reviewText: I love Listerine it's all we use and I love that this one is alcohol-free and it doesn't burn. The fact that it’s alcohol-free is a major plus for me. Unlike some other mouthwashes that leave a burning sensation, this one is gentle on my mouth. The flavor is just right not overpowering like some mouthwashes can be. It strikes a perfect balance between freshness and subtlety. I appreciate that I can swish it around without feeling like I’m inhaling a mint factory. After using the Breath Defense Mouthwash, my mouth feels incredibly clean and refreshed. The minty aftertaste lingers just long enough to leave me feeling confident about my breath. Some mouthwashes can be harsh on sensitive gums, but this one is gentle and soothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good minty flavor
reviews.reviewText: I've used Listerine in various forms for decades now, starting back when there was still only the 'original' flavor of their standard product. My favorite is still their "Naturals" which is no longer made it seems.This one is zero alcohol, so not an antiseptic. It also does not carry the ADA seal like the other original-style products.It has a very mild flavor while swishing around in my mouth and then the real mint-yness comes later. This one is entirely for bad breath and doesn't treat other oral issues, so that's something to keep in mind when ordering. Due to price I'd recommend only if Listerine's regular products (zero alcohol or otherwise) don't work well enough for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong/Burns mouth. But leaves it feeling refreshed and cleaner
reviews.reviewText: The mouthwash was sealed, which was good to see.It's a much larger bottle than I anticipated. It's a good size for a several adults.It's very strong and fresh. I like that it doesn't have alcohol, but that doesn't mean it doesn't burn. It still burns your mouth with that fresh and strong menthol taste, like Listerines of the past. I can't seem to hold it in my mouth the full 30 seconds every time. Usually I have to spit it out after about 15 seconds. I'm not sure if my mouth is just sensitive. My mouth felt cleaner and fresher after.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely helps! Follow directions and add it to your routine for fresher breath!
reviews.reviewText: I really like the subtlety of this listerine - it doesn't have the overpowering mint taste of the traditional one, and works even better in my opinion! You just rinse 2x a day. However, I prefer to do the regular dental routine first - scrape tongue, floss, and brush... then rinse.I have noticed a more well-balanced moistness in the mouth (not dry or too much) and cleaner-smelling breath.The bottle is large but easy to grip. The cap seals nicely to prevent any spills.I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for fresher breath!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All the fresh without the sting
reviews.reviewText: This alcohol-free Listerine has a great, fresh mint flavor and no burning, stinging, or numbing sensation. If you’re like me, you LOVE the burn of full-blooded Listerine. So steer clear of this one if that burn makes you feel alive. If, however, you do not live for that old-school, tongue numbing sensation, or if you have kids who are terrified of the sweet sting, then this is a great choice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mouthwash is specifically for bad breath, and doesn't have fluoride or alcohol in it.I can't stand the regular listerine it buuuurrns, but this one is far mpre mild and quite tolerable to swish for 30 seconds. Left me with very fresh breath!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Powerful mouthwash that really leaves mouth feeling clean and fresh without the burning sensation. I wouldn’t say keeps breathe fresh all day, especially after coffee, but I feel it lengthens freshness. My only issue is the cap. It’s a pain to open. It’s a thinner piece of plastic and definitely feels different from the classic black listerine cap. You really have to squeeze the sides to open. My mother who has arthritis would have trouble twisting it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good mouthwash for bad breath
reviews.reviewText: Has a good taste, seemed familiar so maybe there's a common ingredient with other mouthwashes. This is not an anti-cavity mouthwash, since there's no fluoride, but rather for bad breath. It seemed to leave my mouth feeling much cleaner so that was a benefit, and I imagine this would translate to better smelling breath as well. Seems like a good clean mouth supplement after meals and in between brushes.
